name: Gumi, Inc.
description: Gumi, Inc. is a leading global mobile game developer and publisher, known for its innovative approach to game design and its focus on high-quality mobile gaming experiences. Established in 2007 in Japan, Gumi has expanded its operations internationally, establishing a presence in the United States, South Korea, and other regions. The company is recognized for its popular titles, such as 'Brave Frontier' and 'Final Fantasy: Brave Exvius', which have garnered millions of downloads and a dedicated player base. Gumi seeks to push the boundaries of mobile gaming through the integration of cutting-edge technology and engaging storytelling. In addition to its own game development, Gumi partners with various studios to publish games across different genres, including role-playing games (RPGs), strategy games, and action games. The company's mission is to deliver fun and exciting gaming experiences to players worldwide while fostering a vibrant community around its games. Gumi is also exploring new avenues in the gaming industry, such as blockchain gaming and augmented reality (AR), positioning itself as a forward-thinking player in the evolving landscape of mobile entertainment.
